definitions.title: adj.
definitions.body: perh. singing, sweetly sounding, musical;—abs. ´[[כִּנּוֹר נ]] Ps 81:3 sweetly-sounding lyre; cstr., as subst., ´[[נְעִים זְמִרוֹת יִשׂ]] 2Sa 23:1 Israel's sweet singer of songs (cf. Dr:2Sa 8:10 Löhr; Vulgate egregius psaltes Israel, and so Ges Ew al., from I. [[נעם]]; joy of the songs of Isr. HPS, cf. Klo Kit).
